header.author: Richard Boulton
header.title: Some thoughts concerning The Unusual Qualities of the air. Containing Some Cautions necessary to prevent Malignant and Pestilential or Contagious Distempers. As also Proper Medicines to prevent the ill Effects of Malignancy and Contagious Infection, either in Respect of Malignant Fevers, the Small-Pox; or Intermitting Fevers or Agues, especially where Endemical or Epidemical, as in Kent and Essex. By Richard Boulto, sometime of Brazen-Nose Colledge in Oxford.
